com.quantcomponents.algo
Interface ITradingAgentConfigurationManager

All Known Subinterfaces:
IStockDatabaseTradingManager, ITradingManager
public interface ITradingAgentConfigurationManager

Interface to manage trading algorithm configurations

See Also:
ITradingHierarchyManager

Method Summary

Method Detail

isConfigurationValid

boolean isConfigurationValid(TradingAgentFactoryHandle factoryHandle,
                             Properties configuration,
                             Map<String,String> messages)
Validation method for an algorithm configuration

Parameters:
factoryHandle - handle to the algorithm factory
configuration - configuration to be validated
messages - empty map to be filled with error messages, in case of error
Returns:
true if the configuration is correct, false otherwise

createConfiguration

TradingAgentConfigurationHandle createConfiguration(TradingAgentFactoryHandle factoryHandle,
                                                    Properties configuration,
                                                    String name)
Creates an algorithm configuration and returns a handle to it

Parameters:
factoryHandle - the handle to the algorithm factory
configuration - the configuration
name - a readable name to be shown in the UI
Returns:
a handle to the created configuration

getConfigurationProperties

Properties getConfigurationProperties(TradingAgentConfigurationHandle tradingAgentConfigurationHandle)
Returns the configuration properties as set in the previous method

Parameters:
tradingAgentConfigurationHandle - a handle to a configuration
Returns:
the properties of the configuration

removeConfiguration

void removeConfiguration(TradingAgentConfigurationHandle tradingAgentConfigurationHandle)
Removes a configuration

Parameters:
tradingAgentConfigurationHandle - the handle of the configuration to be removed
